name: Delay the Destruction!! Danmaku Downfall
description:
Time is your only resource. You die when you have no time left.

(Post your scores!)

Arrow keys | Move

Z | Shoot

X | Bomb

Shift | Slow

Things that build time:

* Shooting the enemy

* Depleting the enemy's health bar

* Bombing bullets

* Grazing bullets

Things that reduce time:

* Getting hit

* Bombing

Things that increase rank (score, difficulty, and graze radius):

* Bombing bullets

Things that decrease rank (score, difficulty, and graze radius):

* Getting hit
